simplified_answer: Crypto bull markets are primarily driven by four factors: 1) Monetary liquidity conditions, 2) Technological adoption milestones, 3) Regulatory clarity improvements, and 4) Network effect expansion through institutional participation.

related_commander_insights.current_outlook: Moderate bull conditions supported by ETF inflows but constrained by macro headwinds
related_commander_insights.forecast: Potential major bull phase post-2026 halving cycle if Fed pivots

further_reading.title: Digital Asset Market Cycles: A Framework Analysis
Institutional Adoption and Bitcoin Price Dynamics
